divs: sighting detailsriding to florida,my friend driving. looked out and noticed the light aura of a town,maybe five miles out. fairly high above it to the left was what i thought was the harvest moon but quite red. it began to smoothly lower its self and shrink in diameter from the sky as we aproached closer to town. we both were quite excited by what we were seeing. we were gonna go see this thing close. it dropped into a families back yard. at that time the verticle disc was approximately ten\twelve feet in diameter- passing between a large tree and a swingset,by a metal pool. we were climbing the exit ramp to get a better look. it became more intriuging,because the disc of light didnt break up as it passed between a tall tree on one side and a swing set on the other. i thought the light was being beamed like a flashlight and only the disc was being seen.nope it didnt break up,nor did it emitt any light. it quickly jumped to the roof of the house and shrank again to about a foot in diameter-then traversed the ridge and the centerline of the roof(like a roofer would measure it) and took off-straight up.things that were note worthy were as i looked at the side of the disc the side was not there- appeared two dimentional. it did not emit any light or create any shadows though it was very bright. when i say it went up- it headed in that direction however it may have gone out too,but i suspect it went up faster than the eye mind can percieve it. today the closet thing i would compare the color to is a red lazor beam. and like a lazor how the disc of light is reflected off the surface of what you point to. similiar again except it would have focused in the air like on a piece of cellofane. i saw no other object in the sky that this may have come from or went back too. great fun! very different,and it could have detected that we were watching and it got with its business and left. again it was the color of a red lazor and could change size,like some one focusing a beam of a flashlight. it seemed to only be in two dimentions length and width was very brite, but created no shadows did not seem to be projected
Summary: large disc of red light came downfrom sky into persons back yard.changing diameter emmitting no light of its own
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
